name: Stan Smith
longDescription: The adidas Stan Smith features a premium leather upper with perforated 3-Stripes, rubber cupsole, and the iconic Stan Smith heel tab. Perfect for casual everyday wear.

name: Ultraboost 23
longDescription: adidas Ultraboost 23 features updated Boost midsole with 4% more Boost material, Primeknit+ upper for adaptive fit, and Continental™ Rubber outsole for superior traction in wet conditions.

name: Superstar
longDescription: The adidas Superstar features the iconic rubber shell toe, leather upper, and serrated 3-Stripes. Originally made for basketball courts in 1969, now a streetwear essential.

name: NMD_R1
longDescription: adidas NMD_R1 combines retro runner DNA with modern tech. Features Boost cushioning, Primeknit upper, and signature EVA plugs for style and comfort.

name: Ozweego
longDescription: adidas Ozweego features a mesh and synthetic upper, adiprene+ cushioning, and a bold retro-futuristic design. Perfect for streetwear enthusiasts.

name: Continental 80
longDescription: The adidas Continental 80 features a premium leather upper, vulcanized rubber outsole, and iconic contrast stitching. Inspired by 1980s tennis shoes.

name: ZX 2K Boost
longDescription: adidas ZX 2K Boost features full-length Boost midsole, mesh and synthetic upper, and heritage ZX design details from the 1980s running archives.

name: Solarboost 5
longDescription: adidas Solarboost 5 features LEP system for midfoot stability, Continental™ Rubber outsole, and responsive Boost midsole. Designed for marathon runners.

name: Alphabounce+
longDescription: adidas Alphabounce+ features Forgedmesh upper with unique flex zones, Bounce cushioning, and durable outsole. Ideal for gym workouts and cross-training.

name: Predator Freak
longDescription: adidas Predator Freak features Demonskin™ rubber spikes for enhanced control, Primeknit collar for lockdown, and hybrid stud configuration for agility on pitch.

name: Yung-1
longDescription: adidas Yung-1 combines retro running DNA with modern comfort. Features mesh and suede upper, EVA midsole, and bold color blocking for street-ready style.
